committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal section 3108 of title 5, United States Code, which prohibits the employment by the United States and the District of Columbia of individuals employed by detective agencies.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of Federal law prohibiting individuals employed by private detective agencies from being employed by the United States or the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 3108 of title 5, United States Code, which prohibits the employment by the United States and the District of Columbia of individuals employed by detective agencies.
